description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.n0kzqrnJ9gouPGbl]{Cultist}

Your exposure to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Drugs} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poisons} during your time with the cult has left you inured to their effects. Once per day, you can reroll a @Check[type:fortitude]{Fortitude saving throw} to resist the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{disease}, drug, or poison. You must decide to use this ability after rolling but before learning the outcome of your first roll.
